application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate appropriate estate management would be implemented as required by condition 44 in accordance with Policies DMHB11 and DMHB12 of Hillingdon Council's Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020).
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 44 (Estate Management Plan) of planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314, dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works).
